hero.headline: Claude in Chrome Beta: Control Your Browser Directly from Claude Code
hero.summary: Claude Code 2.0.72 introduces Claude in Chrome Beta, a new feature that lets you control your browser directly from the terminal. Working with the Chrome extension at claude.ai/chrome, Claude can now navigate pages, fill forms, click buttons, and interact with web content during coding sessions - unlocking smoother workflows for testing, debugging, and web automation.
hero.whyItMatters: This bridges the gap between terminal-based AI coding and visual web interactions. Developers can now ask Claude to 'test this form submission' or 'check how this component renders' without leaving their workflow. Combined with MCP browser tools, Claude Code is evolving from a code generator into a full development environment that spans IDE, terminal, and browser.

topStories.title: Gemini 3 Flash Achieves 78% SWE-Bench: Google's Fastest Model Beats Its Own Pro
topStories.summary: Google released Gemini 3 Flash achieving 78% on SWE-bench Verified for agentic coding - outperforming not just the 2.5 series but also Gemini 3 Pro. Available now in Gemini CLI v0.22.0-preview with intelligent model routing that automatically selects the optimal model per task.

topStories.title: AI Helps Ship 30% Faster but Produces 1.7x More Bugs, CodeRabbit Study Finds
topStories.summary: A comprehensive study by CodeRabbit analyzing AI-generated code reveals developers ship 30% faster with AI assistance but introduce 1.7x more bugs. The study, titled 'State of AI vs Human Code Generation,' highlights that review bottlenecks are now the biggest productivity drain.

topStories.title: Chatterbox: Resemble AI's State-of-the-Art Open Source TTS Gains 457 Stars Today
topStories.summary: Resemble AI released Chatterbox, an open-source text-to-speech model shooting up GitHub trending. The model offers high-quality voice synthesis locally, appealing to developers building voice-enabled AI applications without cloud dependencies or API costs.

topStories.title: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max Now Available in GitHub Copilot Public Preview
topStories.summary: OpenAI's GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is now rolling out in public preview to GitHub Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise users. The model represents OpenAI's most capable coding model, competing directly with Claude Opus 4.5 for enterprise developer workflows.

trendingRepos.name: resemble-ai/chatterbox
trendingRepos.description: State-of-the-art open-source text-to-speech model. Run high-quality voice synthesis locally without cloud APIs. Perfect for AI applications requiring natural speech output.

trendingRepos.name: virattt/ai-hedge-fund
trendingRepos.description: An AI Hedge Fund Team - autonomous agents that analyze markets, make investment decisions, and execute trades. 257 stars gained today.

trendingRepos.name: astral-sh/ty
trendingRepos.description: An extremely fast Python type checker and language server, written in Rust. From the makers of Ruff, targeting sub-second type checking for large codebases.

trendingRepos.name: anthropics/claude-code
trendingRepos.description: Agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster through natural language commands. 187 stars gained today.

trendingSkills.name: UI/UX Pro Max
trendingSkills.description: Frontend UI/UX design intelligence with 50 styles and 21 palettes. Enables Claude to generate sophisticated, design-system-aware frontend components with consistent styling.

trendingSkills.name: Web Artifacts Builder
trendingSkills.description: Create elaborate multi-component HTML artifacts using React and Tailwind CSS. Build complete interactive components that render beautifully in Claude's artifact viewer.

trendingSkills.name: Go Service Hexagonal
trendingSkills.description: Define Go service structures using hexagonal architecture patterns. Build maintainable, testable Go services with proper domain boundaries and dependency injection.

trendingSkills.name: AI Multimodal Processing
trendingSkills.description: Process multimedia using Google Gemini API for audio, images, and videos. Enable Claude to orchestrate multimodal AI pipelines for content analysis and generation.

newMcpServers.name: morningstar-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Power AI apps with Morningstar's trusted financial content. Access global analyst research, market analysis, and key investment data through AI assistants.

newMcpServers.name: kafka-schema-reg-mcp
newMcpServers.description: Comprehensive MCP server for Kafka Schema Registry with 57+ tools. Multi-registry support, schema contexts, migration tools, and OAuth authentication for complete schema management.

newMcpServers.name: linkedin-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Access LinkedIn via AI assistants. Scrape profiles and companies, get recommended jobs, and perform job searches. Requires li_at cookie authentication.

newMcpServers.name: aws-cdk-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: AWS Cloud Development Kit best practices, infrastructure as code patterns, and security compliance with CDK Nag. Essential for AI-assisted cloud infrastructure development.

notableHooks.name: Permission Request Notifier
notableHooks.description: PermissionRequest hooks fire when a permission dialog appears. Use them to auto-allow trusted operations or notify external systems when Claude needs approval.

notableHooks.name: Subagent Stop Tracking
notableHooks.description: SubagentStop hooks fire when spawned subagents complete their work. Track parallel agent execution, aggregate results, or chain workflows across multiple agents.

notableHooks.name: Pre-Compact Backup
notableHooks.description: PreCompact hooks trigger before context compaction. Save session state, export conversation logs, or archive context before compression to preserve important details.

tuiTools.name: zellij
tuiTools.description: Terminal workspace with batteries included. Modern tmux alternative with layouts, plugins, and session management built-in. Written in Rust for performance.

tuiTools.name: termscp
tuiTools.description: Multi-protocol file transfer client supporting SCP, SFTP, FTP, and S3. Beautiful TUI for managing remote files across different services from one interface.

tuiTools.name: dive
tuiTools.description: Tool for exploring Docker image layers. Visualize what's in each layer, find wasted space, and optimize your container images. Essential for container development.

tuiTools.name: bottom
tuiTools.description: Customizable cross-platform graphical process/system monitor. Beautiful charts for CPU, memory, network, and disk. Modern htop alternative built with Ratatui.

highlights: Claude in Chrome Beta: Control your browser directly from Claude Code via Chrome extension
File suggestion performance improved ~3x faster in git repos with .ignore/.rgignore files
Opus 4.5 available to Pro users with extra usage purchase option
Gemini 3 Flash launched with 78% SWE-bench Verified score for agentic coding
Windows clipboard image support with Alt+V paste workaround
Quota visibility: /stats now displays quota info for all available models
Cloud exec: --branch for remote runs with status/diff/apply flows
Linux artifacts now signed via sigstore for enhanced security
Codex Max is now the default model across all operations

notableQuotes.quote: Gemini 3 Flash achieves a SWE-bench Verified score of 78% for agentic coding, outperforming not only the 2.5 series, but also Gemini 3 Pro.
notableQuotes.author: Google AI Team

notableQuotes.quote: AI helps ship faster but produces 1.7x more bugs. Review bottlenecks are now the biggest productivity drain - not the code generation itself.
notableQuotes.author: CodeRabbit
notableQuotes.role: State of AI vs Human Code Generation Report

notableQuotes.quote: Your job is to deliver code you have proven to work. AI can generate code faster than ever, but verification remains a human responsibility.
notableQuotes.author: Simon Willison

prompt: Generated via /generate-news slash command. Claude fetches data from 9 sources in parallel (aggregated RSS feed, 7 web searches, GitHub trending via trotd, SkillsMP feed, Claude Code/Gemini CLI/Codex changelogs, Docker MCP catalog via mcp-find, YouTube trending API, Claude Code hooks docs, awesome-tuis list), deduplicates against the past 7 days of digests, then curates into structured JSON.
